entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • "Unable to locate repository with working directory that contains directory <dir>" even without SourceLink in .Net 8.0 #36926
  • dotnet cli -- Use a command to output everything about the CLI's capabilities #36925
  • `dotnet watch` broken in `8.0.100` #36918
  • `dotnet publish --tl on` fails with `MSBUILD : error MSB1009: Project file does not exist.` #36921
  • 'dotnet sln add' failed after upgrade to SDK 8.0 #36905
  • dotnet-ef installation fails since 8.0 release #36904
  • Unable to build sdk.sln on the v8.0.100 tag due to error NU1102: Unable to find package dotnet-format with version (>= 8.0.453106) #36900
  • 'LinkBase' ignored for items added in target #36899
  • Warning when building netcoreapp 1/2 with .NET 8 SDK #36897

Closed

  • How can I replicate a VS "Publish" operation in the command line, when COM components are involved #36778
  • dotnet workload fails to install microsoft.net.sdk.android.manifest-7.0.100.msi.x64 (33.0.95) #36658
  • .NET 7.0: Arm64 Docker build fails with NullReferenceException for TargetOutputs on restore step #29892
  • 8.0.100 SDK installed by `dotnet-install.sh` contains rc2 files #36884
  • .NET 8: New hash added to product version, can't find a workaround or find info about this change #36885

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2316617 #36923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #36874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0.1xx #36882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Simplify and improve signature verification for workloads on Windows #36787
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
